column4: yeah i read about that building stuff haha i heard it can be a pain in the butt
well in ubuntu's gnome....
the desktop shortcut didnt work
it had the exclamation point icon
and it said desktop not found
like i just installed my first linux distro last week
so i dont really know what im doing
im copying and pasting forum threads
i had to reinstall ubuntu because i copied and pasted a source.list file in order to add repositories
turns out it was for the wrong version of ubuntu haha screwed me up
Nice.
It comes in the default install of Ubuntu.
I had that problem too.  Mucked around in settings and eventually fixed it, but I'm not sure exactly what.
Ctrl-Shift-{C,V}
Thought you meant a terminal window.
No, you should use apt-get instead and never do anything yourself, 'cause that would take effort and would be silly.
Synaptic is a frontend to apt.
And when you find the package, it's as easy as sudo apt-get install gdesklets
It means you should call it a channel, not a chat room.
I have some gdesklets.
Hit 'ch' and then TAB.
what else do you use besides desklets.. or do you use them for the majority?
I have 4 of those (ext. IP, POP mailbox watcher, countdown timer, and uptime), and have CPU, mem, and disk writing info from the Gnome panel functionality.
Right-clivk, add to panel.
